plot: The misadventures of two actors trying to get their break in Hollywood and their encounters with starlets, loan sharks, the Russian mafia, bimbos, hitmen and, scariest of all...auditions with casting directors.
title: Big Shots
plot_es: The misadventures of two actors trying to get their break in Hollywood and their encounters with starlets, loan sharks, the Russian mafia, bimbos, hitmen and, scariest of all...auditions with casting directors.
plot_en: The misadventures of two actors trying to get their break in Hollywood and their encounters with starlets, loan sharks, the Russian mafia, bimbos, hitmen and, scariest of all...auditions with casting directors.
